mapper.insert: INSERT INTO appauths( appId, appName, appKey, appType, status, createdAt ) VALUES ( #{appId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.appId appId, a.appName appName, a.appKey appKey, a.appType appType, a.status status, DATE_FORMAT(a.createAt, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime FROM appauths a WHERE a.app_id = #{appId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
